ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.trading

Class Trade

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.trading.Trade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable

    public class Trade
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable
    Model which represents a single trade. The Trade is immutable except for the following: - state - borrowersItems - comments In particular, getTradeUUID() will remain constant across modifications to these fields and also across all time and space. State is managed by the

    • Constructor Detail

      • Trade

        public Trade(java.util.UUID tradeUUID,
     android.content.Context context)
        Builds a Trade object from an existing Trade's UUID. This does not create a new Trade. Instead, it builds an object which represents the existing trade with the given UUID.
        Parameters:
        tradeUUID -
        context -

      • Trade

        public Trade(User borrower,
     User owner,
     java.util.Collection<Item> borrowersItems,
     java.util.Collection<Item> ownersItems,
     android.content.Context context)
        Creates a new Trade, gives it a unique identifier (UUID), and persists it.
        Parameters:
        borrower - User offering to trade for the owner's single item
        owner - Owner of the single item
        borrowersItems - Items borrower is offering for the owner's single item
        ownersItems - List of owner's single item
        context - The application context. Used to fetch and save data using @{link DataManager}.

        Throws:
        IllegalTradeModificationException - if this trade is no longer in an editable TradeState

      • getComments

        public java.lang.String getComments()
        Gets the owner comments for this trade. This becomes non-null once the trade is in state TradeStateAccepted
        Returns:
        The owner's comments

      • setComments

        public void setComments(java.lang.String comments)
        Sets the owner comments for this trade
        Parameters:
        comments - The owner's comments

      • offer

        public void offer()
           throws IllegalTradeStateTransition
        Offers this trade. Only a trade with TradeStateComposing can be offered.
        Throws:
        IllegalTradeStateTransition - if this trade cannot be offered

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
            throws IllegalTradeStateTransition
        Cancels this trade. Only a trade with TradeStateComposing can be cancelled.
        Throws:
        IllegalTradeStateTransition - if this trade cannot be cancelled

      • accept

        public void accept()
            throws IllegalTradeStateTransition
        Accepts this trade. Only a trade with TradeStateOffered can be accepted.
        Throws:
        IllegalTradeStateTransition - if this trade cannot be accepted

      • decline

        public void decline()
             throws IllegalTradeStateTransition
        Declines this trade. Only a trade with TradeStateOffered can be declined.
        Throws:
        IllegalTradeStateTransition - if this trade cannot be declined

      • removeObserver

        public void removeObserver(Observer observer)
        Remove an Observer from maintained collection of Observers. This Observer should no longer be notified of changes.
        Specified by:
        removeObserver in interface Observable
        Parameters:
        observer - the Observer to remove
